import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import "./Home.css"; import upload from "../components/Upload"; const Home = () => { const [userData, setUserData] = useState(); const [front, setFront] = useState(''); const [back, setBack] = useState(''); const [left, setLeft] = useState(''); const [right, setRight] = useState(''); return (
setFront(e.target.value)} accept="image/*"/> setBack(e.target.value)} accept="image/*"/> setLeft(e.target.value)} accept = "image/*"/> setRight(e.target.value)} accept="image/*"/>
) } export default Home
